alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of the St Johns River, northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mandarin, moving south-southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The St Johns River north of Federal Point, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Nas Jax, Fleming Island, Ortega, Picolata, Switzerland and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: For boaters on or near the St Johns River north of Federal Point, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
